entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 30 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High 14. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 24 April 2023
